algorithm_technique: Constructive algorithm based on parity and pattern
problem_summary_simple: Color unit triangles in a larger triangle red to fill it using a propagation rule.
problem_summary_technical: Selects initial red triangles greedily based on row parity and position to ensure propagation covers all triangles.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by identifying a pattern of initial red triangles that guarantees full coverage.
The parity of the row number and its position within the row are crucial for determining the propagation.
The solution focuses on coloring triangles that are essential for initiating the spread to other parts of the triangle.
